content: in this legal case a court has made a final decision to dissolve the communal ownership of a real estate property the property consists of two parcels and the court has determined the ownership shares for each party involved since the property cannot be easily divided the court has assigned exclusive ownership of the entire property to one party the court has considered the arguments and evidence presented by all parties and has made a decision based on the legal code and principles of division of nondivisible property the court has also addressed the costs and fees associated with the case including technical and legal costs which will be paid by the parties involved the court has determined the value of the property and the cash adjustments that need to be made to the remaining sharers additionally the court has ordered necessary transcriptions and provided for the payment of costs and fees the decision was made on september 8 2022 by judge dr omiss
